head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DESSER, SALLY ANNE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DESSER, SALLY ANNE

block.p: DESSER-Sally Anne. Of Alpine, NJ. Beloved wife of Edwin. Cherished daughter of Leanora and the late Ollie Bolen. Dear sister of Susan Rose. Loving aunt of Kelly and Lauren, also dog Snowball. Services ''Wien & Wien,'' Hackensack, NJ, Tuesday, 11:30 AM (1800-378-1892). Contributions to Turning Point Foundation, PO Box 1200, Alpine, NJ 07620.
